scripts.ssl: echo #1 && ([ -d ssl ] || mkdir ssl) && echo #2 && mkcert -install && echo #3 && mkcert --cert-file=./ssl/%FSBEACON_DOMAIN%.pem --key-file=./ssl/%FSBEACON_DOMAIN%-key.pem %FSBEACON_DOMAIN% && echo #4
scripts.start: echo #0.1 && yarn install && echo #0.2 && yarn ssl && echo #0.3 && node server.js --root-path %ROOT_PATH% --domain %FSBEACON_DOMAIN%
scripts.start-dev: cross-env HTTPS=true FSBEACON_DOMAIN=localhost ROOT_PATH=%ROOT_PATH% echo #0 && yarn start
